Body: Description: As referenced in 00432286, I am opening this new case to get this addressed. I am unable to manually add or import new resources for review. I cannot use AIC until this is resolved. I get the same sort of DB errors we saw before in 00432286. The GUI says, There was an error saving your changes. On 3/3 in the attached log: Cannot insert the value NULL into column 'ID', table 'StealthAudit.dbo.SA_AIC_Resources'; column does not allow nulls. INSERT fails.

From: Angie Sawyer <Angie.Sawyer@nice.com>

Sent: Monday, March 10, 2025 7:28 AM

To: Nicholas Giberson <Nicholas.Giberson@netwrix.com>

Cc: Chris Duden <Chris.Duden@nice.com>

Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #00437825 AIC SQL errors when adding resources

 

Nick, I was pleased with the attention my case got last month after asking for your help.  

 

Because of that, I'm again asking for help with a case I had to spin off from the original. "00437825 - AIC SQL errors when adding resources" was one I opened manually on 3/5 after the support folks failed to do so. I know Nick Zimmer has escalated it, but I haven't heard anything new.

 

I am unable to use AIC until this is resolved. We have already had to skip one of our review cycles because the application was not working as expected. I'd appreciate any help in getting some movement on this issue.

Next Steps Updated: 3/14 Sent instructions to customer. 
Waiting on their response

What We've Learned Updated: 3-14 Dev offered another Script to help rebuild the tables and make the previously suggested changes. Believe this should fix the issue 
Sent to customer.

@Nicholas Zimmer​ - Angie is seeking an update.

Thanks,

Stacy

Next Steps Updated: 3/15 Sent instructions to customer. 
Waiting on their response

What We've Learned Updated: 3-14 Dev offered another Script to help rebuild the tables and make the previously suggested changes. Believe this should fix the issue 
Sent to customer.
3-15 Dev offered another Script to help rebuild the tables and make the previously suggested changes. Believe this should fix the issue 
Sent to customer.

@Tay Caliguiri​ is there any chance that you can follow up with Angie? Her last note:  New Reviews are still failing with the same errors. Let me know if you need anything else from me. 

Thanks,

Stacy

What We've Learned Updated: The issue with the "SA_AIC_Resources" table has been resolved

A similar error is now happening with "SA_AIC_ResourceReviews" - it appears that the AIC tables are missing identity columns, which is likely causing these errors, and may arise with other tables after this one is addressed.

Next Steps Updated: Provided SQL script from dev to customer and will await results.

The query returns the AIC tables that have identity columns and it should return 14 tables on the "ID":
- SA_AIC_AuditEvents
- SA_AIC_FlexibleActivityEvents
- SA_AIC_FlexibleHosts
- SA_AIC_FlexibleLocalGroupMembership
- SA_AIC_FlexiblePermissions
- SA_AIC_FlexibleResources
- SA_AIC_FlexibleSddMatches
- SA_AIC_FlexibleSddMatchHits
- SA_AIC_FlexibleSddMatchSubjectProfiles
- SA_AIC_GroupMemberChanges
- SA_AIC_ResourceAccessRequests
- SA_AIC_ResourceReviewResponses
- SA_AIC_ResourceReviews
- SA_AIC_Resources column:
